attribute.description: Zero-relative row number of the first row to be displayed. If this property is set to zero, rendering will begin with the first row of the underlying data.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: The number of rows to display, starting with the one identified by the "first" property. If this value is set to zero, all available rows in the underlying data model will be displayed.
attribute.name: rows

attribute.description: The current value of this component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of a request-scope attribute under which the model data for the row selected by the current value of the "rowIndex" property (i.e. also the current value of the "rowData" property) will be exposed.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Name or code of the background color for this table.
attribute.name: bgcolor

attribute.description: Width (in pixels) of the border to be drawn around this table.
attribute.name: border

attribute.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that will be applied to any caption generated for this table.
attribute.name: captionClass

attribute.description: CSS style(s) to be applied when this caption is rendered.
attribute.name: captionStyle

attribute.description: Comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that will be applied to the columns of this table. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual column. If the number of elements in this list is less than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, no "class" attribute is output for each column greater than the number of elements in the list. If the number of elements in the list is greater than the number of columns specified in the "columns" attribute, the elements at the posisiton in the list after the value of the "columns" attribute are ignored.
attribute.name: columnClasses

attribute.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that will be applied to any footer generated for this table.
attribute.name: footerClass

attribute.description: Space-separated list of CSS style class(es) that will be applied to any header generated for this table.
attribute.name: headerClass

attribute.description: Comma-delimited list of CSS style classes that will be applied to the rows of this table. A space separated list of classes may also be specified for any individual row. Thes styles are applied, in turn, to each row in the table. For example, if the list has two elements, the first style class in the list is applied to the first row, the second to the second row, the first to the third row, the second to the fourth row, etc. In other words, we keep iterating through the list until we reach the end, and then we start at the beginning again.
attribute.name: rowClasses

attribute.description: Summary of this table's purpose and structure, for user agents rendering to non-visual media such as speech and Braille.
attribute.name: summary

attribute.description: Width of the entire table, for visual user agents.
attribute.name: width
